Also that gay sex because of the nature of the sex has a higher transmission rate than traditional rate. Also there is no benefit except personal gratification.

post_info.post_title: mana'ia - Sex is ONLY for personal gratification

http://4forums.com/political/showthread.php?p=63591#post63591
 
 This I feel is very important topic. Mana'ia has given the classic "sex is only for your own pleasure" stance. 
 
 Can the older members of this forum, who have actually HAD sex, and who aren't virgins actually explain what sex is about.

 
 
 WOW, now that's a tall order. Sex has a multitude of functions. 
 Biologically it is utilized to reproduce our species. 
 Physically it is used for personal gratification but that's not the only use. 
 Sex acts also are used to show power over someone. Rapists use sex as a form of violence. BD/SM participants used sex as a form of control. 
 Sex acts can aslo be an emotional expression of one's adoration/love for their partner. It's a bonding experience.
 
 But the bigest falicy is to think that there is anyone who doesn't have sex. 
 Everyone on the planet has sex, it's called your gender. 
 Even Eunics are biologically one gender (mainly male). 
 Hermaphrodites have sex, they score twice on the sex scale. 
 But to partake in the act of sexual intercourse or sexual encounters is a bit different.
